title: New Buccaneer Tristana HAS NO PEG LEG!!!

embed.description: Full animated 3D models for LoL champion Buccaneer Tristana, try all of the skins!

body: We demand Tristana get back her peg leg back in the Buccaneer Tristana skin rework.  SHE AINT THE SAME!!! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body: I think the main reasoning is, if you watch the animations, just plopping a peg leg on without altering any animation would make it look like the peg has a mind of its own.
Bump, she should definitely keep the peg leg
I like her without the  peg leg it was a bit cliche
SHES NOT THE  SAME D: Plz sir.

> [{quoted}](name=Deadspec,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Ltocr1gt,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-15T10:00:41.324+0000)
>
> do you want old {{champion:14}} back ?

To be honest, I would love a Traditional Sion skin.
